title: [SOLVED]820-4924 - No backlight or picture.
message:
Tiny liquid spill directly on U8330 and R8310.

Replaced both, but no change.

Seems EDP_BLKT_EN becomes unstable once it posts.

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 - No backlight or picture.
message:
Diode mode on EDP_BLKT_EN?
Have you tried a known good 2015 display assembly?

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 - No backlight or picture.
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 33928"]Diode mode on EDP_BLKT_EN?
Have you tried a known good 2015 display assembly?[/QUOTE]

Yes, known good display.

EDP_BKLT_EN in diode is 0.519V

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 - No backlight or picture.
message:
So screen is getting power.

what's voltage on Pin 1?

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 - No backlight or picture.
message: If I press hard on U8330 I get a backlight but no picture. Will try resolder it and see.

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 - No backlight or picture.
message:
Resoldered U8330 and we get picture!

Mark solved please.
